column4: where is sun-java5-jdk ? coz i need to change the path on .sh
sudo dpkg -L <package-name>
it's pretty straight forward. you get the package from the repo and let the package manager do the magic.
afterwards use dpkg -L <package-name> to figure out where it is installed
